Name: Docker - Create and Push Image
Description:
Creates and pushes an Docker Image.

- Requires the Docker infrastructure.
Author: joaoasrosa

Parameters.Name: DockerUsername
Parameters.Label: Docker Username
Parameters.HelpText: The username used to login to DockerHub

Parameters.Name: DockerPassword
Parameters.Label: Docker Password
Parameters.HelpText: The password used to login to DockerHub

Parameters.Name: ApplicationLocation
Parameters.Label: Application Location
Parameters.HelpText: The application location, used to build the Docker image

Parameters.Name: DockerFile
Parameters.Label: Dockerfile
Parameters.HelpText: The Dockerfile definition. If the Dockerfile is part of the package leave it blank

Parameters.Name: ImageTag
Parameters.Label: Image Tag
Parameters.HelpText: The image tag. Leave it blank for 'latest'
